veggie.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • veggie.model.MovingImage
      • veggie.model.Player

  • public class Player
extends MovingImage
    Author:
    awang104 PlayerController is the player character for the platform mode with physics traits.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Player

        public Player(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,processing.core.PImage> playerImages,
              int x,
              int y,
              boolean isBot,
              Stats statistics,
              Moves[] moveList)
        Creates a new PlayerController object
        Parameters:
        playerImages - image texture of object
        x - x coordinate of object
        y - y coordinate of object
        isBot - true if Player is a bot
        statistics - a Stats object holding the statistics of the Player
        moveList - an array of Moves that represent the player's moves.

      • checkPlayer

        public void checkPlayer(java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.Rectangle> platform)
        Checks to see if the player can fall onto the platform.
        Parameters:
        platform - an ArrayList of Rectangles that represents the platform the player is on.

      • jump

        public void jump()
        Changes vertical velocity of object

      • battle

        public boolean battle(Player bot)
        Determines when to "battle" and switch to battle mode.
        Parameters:
        bot - the other player this player object is battling
        Returns:
        true if the bot intersects and will battle with the player

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Completely stops the player's velocity.

        public void stopHorizontal()
        Completely stops the player's horizontal velocity.

        public void freeze()
        Freezes the player, preventing it from changing velocity.

      • isOnSurface

        public boolean isOnSurface()
        Returns:
        true if player is on a surface such as a platform.

      • unFreeze

        public void unFreeze()
        Unfreezes the player, allowing them to accelerate again.

      • isFrozen

        public boolean isFrozen()
        Returns:
        true if player is frozen and cannot accelerate.

      • drainLife

        public void drainLife()
        Decreases the energy and max speed of the player

      • noLife

        public boolean noLife()
        Returns:
        true if player's max speed is essentially 0.
